page.title: 05Fire & Police Stations.
page.content: {SYSTON FIRE STATION It is maintained by 10 part-time fire- men who are summoned in an emergency by electronic bleepers.4 are qualified to drive the fire engine. Six firemen constitute a crew. The fire station comprises a watch room (information centre) and an appliance room which houses the engine and 10 sets of kit. Outside there is a drill ground with a training tower, which is also used for drying hoses. { {SYSTON POLICE STATION Syston is a divisional headquarters. It includes the Blackbird Road and Uppingham Road stations, Leicester. Altogether 265 personnel are employed and between 15 and 20 dogs are used. In addition to solving crime their duties include controlling football crowds and traffic.
